def_en: When you wind down something such as the window of a car, you make it move downwards by turning a handle.
If you wind down, you relax after doing something that has made you feel tired or tense.

def_cn: 逐渐减小(工作规模);使逐步停止;使逐渐关闭
def_en: If someone winds down a business or activity, they gradually reduce the amount of work that is done or the number of people that are involved, usually before closing or stopping it completely.
